landmarks.name: Colosseum
landmarks.description: An ancient oval amphitheatre in the centre of the city.

landmarks.name: Vatican City
landmarks.description: An independent city-state enclaved within Rome.

landmarks.name: Pantheon
landmarks.description: A former Roman temple, now a church.

landmarks.name: Eiffel Tower
landmarks.description: A wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars.

landmarks.name: Louvre Museum
landmarks.description: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument.

landmarks.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
landmarks.description: A medieval Catholic cathedral on the Île de la Cité.

landmarks.name: Tokyo Tower
landmarks.description: A communications and observation tower in the Shiba-koen district.

landmarks.name: Senso-ji Temple
landmarks.description: An ancient Buddhist temple located in Asakusa.
